data.title: List of All Characters and Voice Actors
authors: Monster Hunter Rise: Sunbreak Walkthrough Team
data.meta_description: This is a list of characters and their English and Japanese voice actors found within Monster Hunter Rise (MH Rise): Sunbreak. Read on to see if you can recognize some of your favorite voice actors!
data.meta_site_name: Game8｜The Top Gaming and App Walkthroughs Straight from Japan!
data.text:
This is a list of characters and their English and Japanese voice actors found within Monster Hunter Rise (MH Rise): Sunbreak. Read on to see if you can recognize some of your favorite voice actors!

Characters and Voice Actors

(English and Japanese)

Quest Receptionists

Monster Hunter has seen different Quest Receptionists in the course of its existence from MH1 to Sunbreak. We've compiled a list of all Quest Receptionists from the very first installment of Monster Hunter up to Sunbreak!

List of Quest Receptionists

Characters and Hunter Voiced in Three Languages

There are three official voice languages that Characters and the Hunter has in Monster Hunter Rise. These Voice languages are Monster Hunter Language, English, and Japanese!

You can switch through these settings by going to the Main Menu and picking Options.

Once there, go to language options which you will then see sliders for Text and Voice. Voice is where you can find the three official languages. You can then choose through these three options.

Hunter Voice Actors

Hunter Voice Actors by Voice Type

If you have found any errors with our list, please let us know in the comments!

Bennett Miho Wataya Type 13 Megan Harvey Minori Suzuki Type 14 Claduia Lenz (Eden Riegel) Madoka Yonezawa Type 15 Jen Fiskum Hana Takeda Type 16 Linsay Rousseau Natsue Sasamoto Type 17 Cristina Vee (Cristina Valenzuela) Anna Yamaki Type 18 Karen Strassman Mabuki Andou Type 19 Caitlyn Elizabeth Nanako Mori Type 20 Cindy Robinson Hiroko Kiso

Cool Girl Monju and Big Bro Hibasa

Cool Girl Monju

VA: Debra Wilson Big Bro Hibasa

VA: SungWon Cho

They also added characters that are voiced by famous actors: Monju, voiced by Debra Wilson, and Hibasa, voiced by SungWon Cho (@ProZD) as paid DLC. So yes, your character can sound just like them!

List of Paid DLC

How to Turn Off Hunter Voice Lines

If you want the original Monster Hunter experience when it comes to player voice lines. You can turn off player voice lines for your character and other players in Monster Hunter Rise. You just need to go to Options in the Main Menu, go to Audio, and then turn Player Voice Frequency OFF.

Hunter Has Voice Lines

Unlike its predecessors, the hunter in Monster Hunter Rise has actual voice lines such as It's Angry! or Let's Go!
